body:
Hello @TomAugspurger! Thanks for submitting the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/reshape/reshape.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/bfb3dfb038b75370160cf51b7cab13bdc4adcbd1/pandas/core/reshape/reshape.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/reshape/test_reshape.py`](https://github.com/TomAugspurger/pandas/blob/bfb3dfb038b75370160cf51b7cab13bdc4adcbd1/pandas/tests/reshape/test_reshape.py) !

> The diff coverage is `100%`.
